noun.description: A long limbless reptile which has no eyelids, a short tail, and jaws that are capable of considerable extension. Some snakes have a venomous bite.

examples: that man is a cold-blooded snake

noun.description: A former system of interconnected exchange rates for the currencies of EC countries.
A long flexible wire for clearing obstacles in piping.

verb.description: Move or extend with the twisting motion of a snake.

origin: Old English snaca, of Germanic origin.
